description: Source file defining the MatchesScreen widget in a Flutter application. It displays a grid of profile matches with optional filters and navigation to filter settings.

classes.name: MatchesScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the screen that shows profile matches with filtering capability.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MatchesScreen, including app bar, list of profiles, and navigation to filter screen.
